title: Second Round Square Solo
description: A video permutation piece about language where 13 poems, ascending from in length from three to fifteen lines, are mechanically read in every possible permutated line-order.

title: Chromatic Deduction
description: Films detached from their natural temporal order and reconfigured into various color-sorted alt-temporal orders.

title: Multiplex Cinema
description: A collection of films that have been rescrambled to exercise and stretch the multitasking-oriented part of your mind, from A1A2A3B1B2B3C1C2C3 To A1B1C1A2B2C2A3B3C3: for us.

title: Chromatic Reduction
description: A spectrum of films rendered as ColorStreams, where each frame is monochromatically reduced to its most relevant color.

title: fffight.site
description: 126 dynamically composed permutations of reconstructed action scenes from the Bourne series; the natural evolution of Bourne rebourne.

title: Bourne rebourne
description: A collection of films that rip apart action shots from the Bourne series and reconstruct them with Strength, Speed, and Vigor.

title: Life in Review
description: A stream of digital memories flashes before your physical eyes.

title: feud.online
description: A series of continuous films about the family, spectacle, and endless repetition.

title: God's Website
description: Finally Helps us track what we say about God right now. Can it help us, the other way around, too?

title: Rain in a Room
description: Explore a digital interpretation of Random International's infamous rain room.

title: David Zwirnher Online
description: Fall through a hole of every Instagram image ever tagged at David Zwirner's NYC Gallery.
